short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy links from github issues and pull requests easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to get a more user-friendly link to all your github pull requests and issues. Simply click on a title or number next to it, to get a custom link.
